## TemporaryStorage interface

Provides api for implementing temporary storage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TemporaryStorage 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [get(name)](./common.temporarystorage.get.md) | Gets value that was stored with 'name' from temporary storage |
|  [remove(name)](./common.temporarystorage.remove.md) | Removes value stored with 'name' from temporary storage |
|  [set(name, value)](./common.temporarystorage.set.md) | Sets value that will be stored with 'name'e in temporary storage |
